thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: MENINI

author: MENINI
title: MENINI
text:
Service was nice, price reasonable.
I booked an hotel in Dubai, breakfast included, then I got what I was booking for, this is good.
Just one thing I did not understand:
I read I will have the choice to cancel/modify my booking till few days before my planned stay at the hotel paying just 1 â‚¬, but I had a full price charged just few days after booking, really in advance I aspected for it following your indication.
It doesn't matter to me becose I haven't changed my mind, but this was something different than what you said on your website.
BTW I will use your site again for my future travel.
